sa upareṇa samayena vikala tām paśyati rājataḥ vā
dṛṣṭvā ca punar asya evam bhavati
evam ātmanaḥ pareṣām ca śrānta kāya tām
sa upareṇa samayena vigata klama śrama tām paśyati

original: tasyaivaṃ bhavatyanityā bateme saṃskārā iti pūrvavat /
analyzed: tasya evam bhavati anityāḥ bata ime saṃskārāḥ iti pūrvavat
evam pariśrama kṛtām vipariṇāma anitya tām paryeṣate

original: evamātmano vā pareṣāmvā paropakrameṇa kāyavikṛtiṃ paśyati /
analyzed: evam ātmanaḥ vā pareṣām vā para upakrameṇa kāya vikṛtim paśyati
tathā vividhaiḥ daśa maśaka sarīsṛpa saṃsparśaiḥ

original: ] apareṇa vā punaḥ samayena tāṃ vikṛtiṃ na paśyati /
analyzed: apareṇa vā punar samayena tām vikṛtim na paśyati
dṛṣṭvā ca punar asya evam bhavati anityā bata te
me saṃskārāḥ iti pūrvavat iti evam para upakrama kṛtām vipariṇāma anitya tām paryeṣate
śīta paryavasthāna paryavasthitam uṣṇa abhilāṣa parigatam paśyati
uṣṇa kāle vā punar pratyupasthite a viśada kāyam
saṃkucita kāyam śīta paryavasthāna paryavasthita viśada gātra prasvinna gātram santapta gātram ucchraṣya vacanam tṛṣā parigatam

original: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ pratyudāvarttya punaḥ śītakāle pūrvoktairevākāraiḥ paśyati /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā ca punar pratyudāvarttya punar śīta kāle pūrva uktaiḥ eva ākāraiḥ paśyati
dṛṣṭvā ca punar asya evam bhavati

original: me saṃskārā iti pūrvavadeva[ṃ] śītakṛtāṃ vipariṇāmānityatāṃ paryeṣate /
analyzed: me saṃskārāḥ iti pūrva vat evam śīta kṛtām vipariṇāma anitya tām paryeṣate
sa punar adhyātmam vā rātmanaḥ vā
pareṣām vā caṃkrama sthāna niṣadya śayānaiḥ īryāpathaiḥ anyatama anyatamena īryāpathena ātmānam vā param vā paśyati
punar tena evam ekadā anugṛhyamāṇam paśyati
dṛṣṭvā ca punar asya evam bhavati anityā
evam īryā pathakṛtām vipariṇāma anitya tām paryeṣate
katham sparśa kṛtām vipariṇāma anitya tām paryeṣate

original: sukhavedanīyaṃ sparśaṃ pratītyotpannāṃ sukhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayamānaḥ /
analyzed: sukha vedanīyam sparśam pratītya utpannām sukhām vedanām vedayamānaḥ
yathā sukha devanā avasthām evam duḥkha asukha asu duḥ

original: ] tasya pūrvāṃ paryeṣaṇā āsāṃ vedanānāṃ navanavatāniḥpurāṇa purāṇatāmāpāyikatāṃ tāvatkālikatāmitvarapratyupāsthāyitamanyathībhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā,
analyzed: tasya pūrvām paryeṣaṇāḥ āsām vedanānām purāṇa tām āpāyika tām tāvatkālika tām itvara pratyupāsthāyitam anyathībhāvam dṛṣṭvā
anityāḥ bata ime saṃskārāḥ iti pūrvat
tatra katham kleśa kṛtām vipariṇāma anitya tām vyavacārayati
vigata rāgam sa dveṣam vigata dveṣam

original: samohaṃ vigatamohamanyatamānyatamena vā upakleśenopakliṣṭaṃ cittamupakliṣṭamiti parijānāti /
analyzed: sa moham vigata moham anyatama anyatamena vā upakleśena upakliṣṭam cittam upakliṣṭam iti parijānāti
an upakliṣṭam vā punar an upakliṣṭam iti parijānāti

original: rvāparyeṇaibhiḥ kleśopakleśairavatīparṇavipariṇatāvipariṇatāṃcittasantatiṃ dṛṣṭvaivaṃ bhavatyanityā bateme saṃskārā iti /
analyzed: rvāparyeṇa ebhiḥ kleśa upakleśaiḥ avatīparṇa vipariṇata avipariṇatām citta santatim dṛṣṭvā evam bhavati anityāḥ bata ime saṃskārāḥ iti
tathā hi eṣām pratyakṣataḥ saṃkleśa kṛtaḥ vipariṇāmaḥ upalabhyate
tatra katham vyādhi kṛtām vipariṇāma anitya tām vyavacārayati
iha anena ekadā ātmā ca pare ca dṛṣṭvā aṣṭā
saḥ pareṇa samayena paśyati ātmānam vā
spṛṣṭam śārīrikābhiḥ vedanābhiḥ duḥkhābhiḥ tīvrābhiḥ iti vistareṇa pūrvavat
tatra katham kleśa kṛtām vipariṇāma anitya tām vyavacārayati
iha anena ekadā ātmā ca pare ca dṛṣṭvā dṛṣṭā
saḥ pareṇa samayena paśyati ātmānam vā
sa punar apareṇa samayena paśyati arogiṇam
dṛṣṭvā ca punar asya evam bhavati anityā bata te
tatra katham maraṇa kṛtām vipariṇāma anitya tām vyavacārayati
saḥ pareṇa samayena mṛtam kālagatam paśyati

original: vijñānaśūnyaṃ kalevaraṃ dṛṣṭvā ca punarasyaivaṃ bhavatīti vistareṇa pūrvavat //
analyzed: vijñāna śūnyam kalevaram dṛṣṭvā ca punar asya evam bhavati iti vistareṇa pūrvavat
tatra katham vinīlaka ādi kṛtām vipariṇāma anitya tām vyavacārayati
sa tat eva mṛta kalevaram vinīlaka avastham ekadā paśyati

original: ekadā vipūyakāvasthamenaṃ vistareṇa yāvasthiśaṃkalikāvasthaṃ dṛṣṭvāsyaivaṃ bhavatyanityā bata(te)
analyzed: ekadā vipūyaka avastham enam vistareṇa yā avasthiśaṃkalikā avastham dṛṣṭvā asya evam bhavati anityā bata te
me saṃskārāḥ iti vistareṇa śbhsh pūrvavat
na parikṣaya kṛtām vipariṇāma anitya tām vyavacārayati
sarveṇa sarvam cakṣuṣaḥ an ābhāsa gatā
dṛṣṭvā ca punar asya evam bhavati anityā bata te

original: me saṃskārāstathā hyeṣāṃ paurvāparyeṇa pratyakṣata evāyamevaṃ rūpo vikāra upalabhyate /
analyzed: me saṃskārāḥ tathā hi eṣām paurvāparyeṇa pratyakṣataḥ eva ayam evam rūpaḥ vikāraḥ upalabhyate

original: evaṃ tāvatpratyakṣādhipateyena manaskāreṇādhyātmikasya vastunaḥ [paṃca] daśabhirākārairvipariṇāmānityatāṃ vyavacārayati /
analyzed: evam tāvat pratyakṣa ādhipateyena manaskāreṇa ādhyātmikasya vastunaḥ paṃca daśabhiḥ ākāraiḥ vipariṇāma anitya tām vyavacārayati
ṣoḍaśavidhasya bāhyasya vastunaḥ vipariṇāma anitya tām vyavacārayati

original: ye 'nena pṛthivīpradeśā nābhisaṃskṛtāḥ pūrvaṃ dṛṣṭā bhavanti /
analyzed: ye nena pṛthivī pradeśāḥ na abhisaṃskṛtāḥ pūrvam dṛṣṭāḥ bhavanti
gṛha vastu āpaṇa vastu puṇya śālā devakula vihāra vastu prakāraiḥ paścāt ca abhisaṃskṛtān paśyati an abhisaṃskṛtān paśyati a nandi navān su kṛtān su upaliptān

original: titapatitān khalu chidrānagninā vā dagdhānudakena vāpahratāṃ(hṛtān) /
analyzed: tita patitān khalu chidrān agninā vā dagdhān udakena vā apahrata aṃhṛtān
dṛṣṭvā ca punar asya evam bhavati
evam pṛthivyām vipariṇāma anitya tām vyavacārayati

original: evaṃ tṛṇauṣadhivanaspataya ārāmodyānāni ca samṛddhapatrapuṣpaphalāni paśyati /
analyzed: evam tṛṇa oṣadhi vanaspatayaḥ ārāma udyānāni ca samṛddha patra puṣpa phalāni paśyati

original: tathā parvatānyekadā samṛddhapāṣāṇāni paśyatyekadā nirluṭhitapāṣāṇāni patita śrṛṃgāṇi,
analyzed: tathā parvatāni ekadā samṛddha pāṣāṇāni paśyati ekadā nirluṭhita pāṣāṇāni patita śrṛṃgāṇi
samṛddha udakāni paśyati ekadā parikṣīṇa udakāni

original: sarveṇa vā sarvaṃ viśuṣkāṇi khilībhūtāni koṭarāṇi /
analyzed: sarveṇa vā sarvam viśuṣkāṇi khilībhūtāni koṭarāṇi
tathā karmāntān ekadā sampadyamānān paśyati ekadā vipadyamānām nān paśyati
tat yathā kṛṣi karmāntān nau karmāntān samyagvyavahāra karmāntān vividhān śilpa vidhān śilpa

original: tathā kośasannidhīnāṃ vicitrāṇāṃ nānāprakārāṇāmekadā ācayaṃ paśyatyekadā apacayaṃ /
analyzed: tathā kośa sannidhīnām vicitrāṇām nānā prakārāṇām ekadā ācayam paśyati ekadā apacayam
tathā bhojana pānam ca ekadā an abhisaṃskṛta annā
vastham paśyati ekadā abhisaṃskṛta avastham ekadā lālā visara viklinnam ekadā yāvat uccāra prasrāva avastham paśyati

original: (Śbh_Sh 484) tathā vividhāni yānānyekadā sumaṇḍitāni svalaṃkṛtānyabhinavāni paśyatyekadā vigatālaṃkārāṇi /
analyzed: tathā vividhāni yānāni ekadā su maṇḍitāni su alaṃkṛtāni abhinavāni paśyati ekadā vigata alaṃkārāṇi
tathā vastrāṇām ekadā abhinava tām paśyati ekadā purāṇa tām
prakṣīṇa tām ekadā śuddha tām ekadā malina tām
tathā alaṃkārāṇām ekadā anabhisaṃskṛta tām ekadā abhisaṃskṛta tām ekadā sāra tām ekadā abhinna prabhinna tām vikṣīṇa tām paśyati
tathā nṛtta gīta vāditānām pratyutpanna prayoga vicitra bhūyas samudgatām bhava bhaṃga tām paśyati
tathā gandha mālya vilepanānām pratyagra sugandha amlāna tām paśyati
apareṇa samayena na ati sugandha durgandha mlāna viśuṣka tām paśyati
tathā bhāṇḍa upaskārāṇām an abhisaṃskāra abhisaṃskāra sāra bhagna tām paśyati
tathā āloka anukārayoḥ saṃbhava vibhava tām paśyati
tathā strī puruṣa caryā sambhava vibhava tām paśyati
dṛṣṭvā ca punar asya evam bhavati anityā bata te
me saṃskārāḥ tathā hi eṣām bāhyānām saṃskārāṇām

original: ebhiraṣṭābhirvipariṇāmakāraṇaiḥ pūrvanirdiṣṭairasyādhyātmikabāhyasya vastuno yathāyogaṃ pratyakṣādhipateyena manaskāreṇaivaṃ vipariṇāmākāreṇānityatāṃ  #
analyzed: ebhiḥ aṣṭābhiḥ vipariṇāma kāraṇaiḥ pūrva nirdiṣṭaiḥ asya ādhyātmika bāhyasya vastunaḥ yathāyogam pratyakṣa ādhipateyena manaskāreṇa evam vipariṇāma ākāreṇa anitya tām

original: (Śbh_Sh 485) yathānena sā vipariṇāmānityatā pratyakṣaṃ dṛṣṭā bhavatyanubhūtā,
analyzed: yathā anena sā vipariṇāma anitya tā pratyakṣam dṛṣṭā bhavati anubhūtā
apara pratyayaḥ ca tasyām bhavati an anya neyaḥ
tena ucyate pratyakṣa ādhipateyaḥ manaskāraḥ iti

original: sa evaṃ pratyakṣādhipateyena manaskāreṇa vipariṇāmānityatāṃ vyavahā(cā)
analyzed: saḥ evam pratyakṣa ādhipateyena manaskāreṇa vipariṇāma anitya tām vyavahācā

original: yeṣāṃ rūpiṇāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ satī samvidyamānā kṣaṇotpannabhagnā vinīlatā(vilīnatā)
analyzed: yeṣām rūpiṇām saṃskārāṇām satī samvidyamānā kṣaṇa utpanna bhagnā vinīla tā vilīna tā

original: tatra pratyakṣādhipateyaṃ manaskāraṃ niśrityānumānaṃ karotyevañca punaranumānaṃ karoti /
analyzed: tatra pratyakṣa ādhipateyam manaskāram niśritya anumānam karoti evam ca punar anumānam karoti
kṣaṇa utpanna bhagna vilīnānām eṣām saṃskārāṇām iyam pūrveṇa aparā vikṛtiḥ yujyate

original: iti hi kṣaṇikāḥ saṃskārāsteṣu teṣu pratyayeṣu satsu tathā tathotpadyante /
analyzed: iti hi kṣaṇikāḥ saṃskārāḥ teṣu teṣu pratyayeṣu satsu tathā tathā utpadyante
utpannāḥ ca an apekṣya vināśa kāraṇam sva rasena vipanaśyanti
yāni punar etāni vipariṇāma kāraṇāni tāni anyathā utpattaye

original: ] sahaiva tena vināśakāraṇena vinaṣṭānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ yasmādvisadṛśā (śī)
analyzed: saha eva tena vināśa kāraṇena vinaṣṭānām saṃskārāṇām yasmāt visadṛśā śī
na tu sarveṇa sarvam apravṛttiḥ eva
yeṣām vā punar saṃskārāṇām sarveṇa sarvam apravṛttiḥ upalabhyate

original: tadyathā kvāthyamānāmasāmante sarveṇa sarvamparikṣayo bhavati agninirdagdhānāṃ ca lokabhājanānāṃ masirapi na [pra]jñāyate /
analyzed: tat yathā kvāthyamāna āma sāmante sarveṇa sarvamparikṣayaḥ bhavati agni nirdagdhānām ca loka bhājanānām masiḥ api na prajñāyate

original: śiṣṭamapi na prajñāyate teṣāmapyuttarottarakaraṇaparyādānādante sarveṇa sarvamabhāvo bhavati /
analyzed: śiṣṭam api na prajñāyate teṣām api uttara uttara karaṇa paryādānāt ante sarveṇa sarvam abhāvaḥ bhavati

original: ] tasmādvipariṇāmakāraṇānyetānyaṣṭau yathoktāni svarasenaiva tu vināśo bhavati /
analyzed: tasmāt vipariṇāma kāraṇāni etāni aṣṭau yathā uktāni svarasena eva tu vināśaḥ bhavati
saḥ evam ānumānika manaskāreṇa saṃskāreṇa akṣaṇa utpanna bhagna vilīna tāyām niścayam pratilabhya punar api apratyakṣa para loka asaṃskāra pravṛttau anumānam
yad rūpaiḥ sattvaiḥ yat rūpam pūrvam eva bhūtam kṛtam
kuśala akuśalam citra karma kṛtam upacitam
tena pratyayena teṣām idam ātma bhāva vaicitryam abhinirvṛttam
na ca etat īśvara nirmāṇa hetukam yujyate

original: sa cedīśvaranirmāṇahetukaṃ syāttadīśvarapratyayameva vā syādanyena vopādāneneśvaro nirmimīta /
analyzed: sa ced īśvara nirmāṇa hetukam syāt tat īśvara pratyayam eva vā syāt anyena vā upādānena īśvaraḥ nirmimīta

original: sa cedīśvara pratyayameva syāt teneśvarasyaiṣāñca saṃskārāṇāṃ yaugapadyaṃ syāt /
analyzed: sa ced īśvara pratyayam eva syāt tena īśvarasya eṣām ca saṃskārāṇām yaugapadyam syāt
vā syāt nirhetu kā kīm vā

original: ] yadi sahetukā īśvarahetukaiva ca tena pūrvakeṇa doṣeṇa tulyatayā na yujyate /
analyzed: yadi sa hetukā īśvara hetukā eva ca tena pūrvakeṇa doṣeṇa tulya tayā na yujyate

original: (Śbh_Sh 488) praṇidhānamīśvaravinirmuktānyadharmahetukā tathā sarve 'pi saṃskārā dharmahetukā eva bhaviṣyanti /
analyzed: praṇidhānam īśvara vinirmukta anya dharma hetukā tathā sarve pi saṃskārāḥ dharma hetukāḥ eva bhaviṣyanti
kim īśvareṇa vṛthā kalpitena iti evamādinā ānumānikena manaskāreṇa evaṃbhāgīyena
para lokena saṃskāra pravṛttau niścayam pratilabhate
saḥ evam tris prakāra manaskāra ādhipatyena śraddhā ādhipateyena pratyakṣa ādhipateyena anumāna ādhipateyā nāṃyām

original: tatra yā pūrva pañca [vidhā]nityatā pañcākārabhāvanānugatā uddiṣṭā,
analyzed: tatra yā pañca vidhā anityatā pañca ākāra bhāvanā anugatā uddiṣṭā
visaṃyoga ākārāḥ anitya ākārāḥ anitya tā katamā
tatra adhyātmam upādāya yathā api tad ekatyaḥ pūrvam pareṣām

original: so 'pareṇa samayena svāmibhāvamadāsabhāvaṃ vihāya pareṣāṃ dāsabhāvamupagacchati /
analyzed: saḥ pareṇa samayena svāmi bhāvam a dāsa bhāvam vihāya pareṣām dāsa bhāvam upagacchati
tathā santaḥ samvidyamānāḥ bhogāḥ a vipariṇatā
yathā api tasyāḥ eva vipariṇāma anitya tāyāḥ vināśa anitya tāyāḥ
vartamāne pi adhvani asamavahitāyāḥ anābhoge gate

original: 'dhvani bhāvinyā dharmatāṃ pratividhyatyevaṃ dharmāṇa ete saṃskārā anāgate 'dhvani evaṃbhāgīyā iti /
analyzed: dhvani bhāvinyā dharmatām pratividhyati evam dharmāṇaḥ ete saṃskārāḥ anāgate dhvani evaṃbhāgīyāḥ iti
visaṃyoga anitya tām samavahitām saṃbhuravībhūtām ākārayati
saḥ evam ādhyātmika bāhyānām saṃskārāṇām pañcavidhāyām anitya tāyām ebhiḥ pañcabhiḥ ākāraiḥ yathāyogam manasikāra bāhulyāt upapatti sādhana bhāvanā ādhipatyāt ca
yam pratilabhya tad anantaram duḥkha ākāram avatarati
ye ete saṃskārāḥ anityāḥ teṣām anitya tām tā

original: iti hyeta eva saṃskārā jātidharmāṇaḥ jātiśca duḥkhā, yadā(yā)
analyzed: iti hi ete eva saṃskārāḥ jāti dharmāṇaḥ jātiḥ ca duḥkhā
sa upādānāḥ teṣu saṃyojana bandhana ākāreṇa duḥkha ākāram avatarati
tṛṣṇā saṃyojanam ca jāti jarā vyādhi maraṇa śoka parideva duḥkha daurmanasya upāyāsa bandhanasya
rāga dveṣa moha bandhanasya ca adhiṣṭhānam
tatra ayogakṣema amāreṇa aduḥkha asukha sthānīyeṣu skandheṣu duḥkha ākāram avatarati

original: tathā hyaduḥkhāsukhāsthānīyāḥ skandhāḥ sopādānā dauṣṭhulyasahagatā abījānugatā avinirmuktā duḥkhaduḥkhatayā,
analyzed: tathā hi aduḥkha asukha asthānīyāḥ skandhāḥ sa upādānāḥ dauṣṭhulya sahagatāḥ abīja anugatāḥ a vinirmuktāḥ duḥkha duḥkha tayā
evam ayam yogī sukha sthānīyeṣu saṃskāreṣu
sukhāyām ca vedanāyām vipariṇāma duḥkha tām avatīrṇaḥ bhavati

original: yaduta saṃyojanabandhanākāreṇa duḥkhavedanāsthānīyeṣu saṃskāreṣuduḥkhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ duḥkhaduḥkhatāmavatīrṇo bhavati /
analyzed: yat uta saṃyojana bandhana ākāreṇa duḥkha vedanā sthānīyeṣu saṃskāreṣu duḥkhāyām vedanāyām duḥkha duḥkha tām avatīrṇaḥ bhavati
yat uta aniṣṭa ākāreṇa aduḥkha asukha sthānīyeṣu
duḥkha asukhāyām ca vedanāyām saṃskāra duḥkha tām avatīrṇaḥ bhavati
